ygData.subject: Re: Skill caps
ygData.msgSnippet: I believe that the fighting skills have a different cap.  Piercing and 2H blunt and so on cap at level +1 times 3.  Offense and Defense follow the regular cap
ygData.messageBody:
I believe that the fighting skills have a different cap. Piercing and 2H
blunt and so on cap at level +1 times 3. Offense and Defense follow the
regular cap rules, as you stated them.
Aznyin
Level 14 Erudite Wizard
Chivalric Order of Norrath
Current Residence: Rivervale [Solusek Ro]

-----Original Message-----
From: Chad Eldridge [mailto:chad@...]
Sent: Tuesday, May 04, 1999 4:37 AM
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
Subject: [eq_wizards] Skill caps


No mstokes those formulas are not correct. The skill lvl formula, and this
applies to all skills except languages, trade skills, swimming and stuff
like that, is:

your lvl times 5 plus 5

so at lvl 1 your cap is 10
at lvl 4 your cap is 25

Marthanis Thundermage
Order of the Storm
15th Erudite Wizard
